EntryDock.Body: The docking bay creaks beneath your feet. Saltwater drips from the ceiling. You're here, alone, again.

Hallway.Body: Dim lights flicker overhead. The walls, once sterile white, are stained and warped. The silence is almost too heavy.

ObservationDeck.Body: A massive glass pane overlooks the abyss. Dark waters press against it. Something stirs in the deep.

FloodedTunnel.Body: Rusty railings line a tunnel half-swallowed by seawater. You can't see the bottom. A chill runs down your spine.

QuarantineChamber.Body: Sterile. Cold. The air is still, unnaturally so. Something unseen lingers in the corners of the room.

ControlRoom.Body: Blinking monitors scatter distorted footage. An alarm light pulses. You feel like you're being recorded.

BreakRoom.Body: A dusty couch faces a silent radio. Old coffee cups sit untouched. You swear you hear static, faint and whispering.

ResearchLab.Body: The lab is in disarray, papers scattered, drawers pulled open. On a metal table, a keycard glints under a flickering light.

StorageCloset.Body: A cramped space with shelves of bleach and old tools. The scent is sharp, stinging your nose. Nothing else seems useful.
